title: Exotic Bali
brief_description: An introductory travelogue focusing on the potential tourist attractions that Bali has to offer. Areas included are: Farmlife and market life, cultural ceremonies and way of life, cock fighting, a Balanese funeral procession, cultural ceremonies.
